Control.ttp: deThis page provides information related to System Settings.

Control.lbl: deBypass proxy server for local addresses:
Control.ttp: deSynchronize the date and time on the device with the date and time on my computer.
deChecked indicates that Proxy is enabled on this device.
deClick to display online help related to this page...
deClick to open the print dialog for sending the contents of this page to the default printer...
deClick to refresh the contents of this page...

Messages.Message: de'Internet Proxy Host' minimum length is 4.
de'Internet Proxy Host' is required when Access the Internet using a proxy server contains a 'checkmark'.
de'Internet Proxy Port' minimum length is 2.
de'Internet Proxy Port' is required when Access the Internet using a proxy server contains a 'checkmark'.
